mapper.update: CREATE TABLE `sys_news` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `type` bit(3) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '类型：1前台公告，2前台新闻，3后台公告，4后台公告', `title` varchar(100) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '标题', `content` varchar(5000) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci NULL COMMENT '内容', `createTime` timestamp(0) DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', `updateTime` timestamp(0) DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) COMMENT '更新时间', `publishTime` timestamp(0) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '发布时间', `account_id` int(10) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '用户id', `status` bit(2) NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '状态0未发布，1已发布，2已删除', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, INDEX `I_type_status`(`type`, `publishTime`, `status`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4 COLLATE = utf8mb4_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;
